name: Roboson Crusoe and the Spiders from Muranus
name_original: Roboson Crusoe and the Spiders from Muranus
description:
After his Spaceship was destroyed Roboson Crusoe stranded on the tiny planet Muranus. He tries to send an emergency signal but then the evil Spiders attack him.

Feed the Antenna with battery cells to keep the signal alive. You can find them on the surface of Muranus. Fight against the spiders and eventually Roboson will survive.

Everything in the game (including all textures, 3D-models, effects, sounds and music) was made in 72 hours from scratch.

Developers: Samuel Arndt and Moritz Will;
Location: Bavaria, Germany
